LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Penetrator.label: Penetrator
LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Penetrator.description: A sniper rifle that was improved and manufactured based on the Ancient Elf Sniper Rifle by applying ancient technology analyzed by half-elves.
LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Grawes.label: Grawes
LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Grawes.description: A shotgun that remade the Grawehr by applying ancient technology analyzed by half-elves.
LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Bullet_Sniper_Rifle.label: Half-elf type large high-speed armor-piercing high-explosive projectile
LanguageData.AS_WHEAT_Bullet_Shotgun_Backshot.label: Half-elf type high power buckshot
LanguageData.AS_AT_GrawehrGun.label: grawehr type
